definition: hot patching (of insulating material in a furnace)/hot patching (runtime correction in computing)
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: Some precision gages used a thermal compensator.
sentences.chinese: 有些精密仪器用了热补偿器。

definition: to take a tonic (for one's health)
tonic food (food considered to be particularly healthful)/to eat such foods
treatment involving the use of tonics to restore the patient's health/reinforcing method (in acupuncture)
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
a person who is in poor health cannot handle sth so strong as a tonic
to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
medicinal dietary supplement that helps build up one's health
an excess of heat caused by a deficiency in Yin energy (idiom)
to warm oneself/to expel the cold (TCM)
deficiency of yin 陰|阴[yin1] in TCM
